body.name: Oster Digital Air Fryer Oven with RapidCrisp, Stainless Steel, 12-Function Countertop Oven with Convection,Silver
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.

features: 12 FUNCTIONS, ONE OVEN: The versatile Oster RapidCrisp Air Fryer Oven combines 12 cooking functions in one oven to make preparing family meals quick and easy—it's an air fryer, convection oven, broiler, toaster oven, dehydrator, and more

FASTER, CRISPIER RESULTS: RapidCrisp Technology uses cyclonic air flow for superior air frying results, providing crispier results in up to 50% of the time; air frying uses 99.5% less oil compared to a 3.7L deep fryer As compared to Oster Air Fryer Oven model 2129751
ONE-TOUCH PRESETS FOR YOUR FAVORITES: Premium touch digital controls include presets for pizza, fries, wings, and veggies; oven provides temperature control up to 450°F
COMPACT DESIGN, SPACIOUS INTERIOR: Fits a 12'' pizza and 4 slices of bread, while still offering an overall compact footprint
MORE FEATURES AND ACCESSORIES: Interior light to easily check on cooking progress; dishwasher-safe air fry basket, baking pan, and wire rack, each with 3 positions; plus removable crumb tray
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Uses 50% less energy than conventional ovens
DURABLE: Oven is built to last, with 1-year warranty
body.description: Cook simple and healthy meals for your family with the Oster Digital RapidCrisp Air Fryer Oven. It combines 12 cooking functions—air fryer, convection oven, broiler, toaster oven, dehydrator, and more—in one premium countertop oven. RapidCrisp Technology provides crispier results up to 50% faster, and with a fraction of the oil compared to deep frying. Plus, one-touch presets let you quickly make favorites like fries, wings, veggies, and pizza. The large interior of this Oster toaster oven fits a 12'' pizza, yet the oven still has a compact footprint. With a brushed stainless steel finish, interior light, and premium touch digital controls, the sleek, modern design complements any kitchen. The air fryer oven comes fully equipped with an air fry basket, baking pan, wire rack, and removable crumb tray—all dishwasher-safe for added convenience. Enjoy powerful air fryer performance and much more with the Oster Digital RapidCrisp Air Fryer Oven. As compared to Oster Air Fryer Oven model 2129751.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed for Ultimate Air Fry Performance Air Fry up to 50% FASTER than a standard air fry oven with RapidCrisp Technology. The extra-large fan and dedicated Air Fry heating element, fueled by 1700 watts of cyclonic power, provide superior air frying results, which means crispier meals and snacks in less time.*

Faster Air Frying and More 12 Functions in One Oven! Enjoy the versatility of multiple appliances in one oven with 12 cooking functions including Bake, Broil, Toast, Air Fry, Dehydrate, and more. Large Capacity, Compact Oven Large capacity air fry oven fits a 12’’ pizza, roasts, pies, or casseroles— yet the compact footprint still saves you countertop space. Touchscreen Digital Controls Features one-touch presets for all your favorites, like pizza, fries, wings, and veggies. Interior Light Included interior light is perfect for easy viewing and monitoring cooking progress.

More Great Features Up to 12-hour timer with auto-shutoffBrushed stainless steel finishAccessories included: dishwasher-safe air fryer basket, baking pan and wire rack, plus removable crumb tray for easy cleaning3 rack positionsTemperature control up to 450 degrees FEnergy-efficient oven uses 50% less energy** *As compared to Oster Air Fryer Oven model 2129751 **Compared to conventional ovens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Air Fryer - Lots of Cooking Space
reviews.reviewText: This product looks great. It's easy to use, set cooking times, and temperature. It has so many functions aside from air fryer. Broil, Bake, Toast, Dehydrate, among others. It cooks food evenly and well. It's easy to clean. I suggest putting a piece of tin foil under the catch plate for even easier cleanup. I love this air fryer. Great value for the cash. It even has a light inside. Great looking product, looks great the kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and speedy cooking
reviews.reviewText: I love the speed of the air fryer function. The pizza setting works very well. The stainless steel body and compact size makes this one of the three most used countertop appliances that I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this to replace another brand of air fryer/toaster oven that died after 9 months. So far, after 4 days, this oven is working as expected. I did have to make adjustments to the time and temperature when making toast, and I lower the temp when air frying. Using the oven for various tasks is very easy and pretty much intuitive.So far, I’ve made toast, lamb chops, chicken wings, chicken parm, meatloaf with baked potatoes, and roasted veggies. The longest the oven has run is 45 minutes at 350, then 10 mins at 425 and none of the outside surfaces got too extremely hot.When on Air Fry, this oven is a bit noisier than my other oven. It’s not bad, but you can definitely tell it’s on. The oven doesn’t get overly hot when it’s working, but I have it set on a heat-resistant counter protecter and I have another protecter placed behind the oven to protect the wall. I also wrapped the wire in several layers of aluminum foil to protect it from any heat from the back.It’s easy to clean the inside. I wipe it down with a mix of water, white vinegar, and a little bit of Dawn dishwashing soap. I wash the air fry basket and oven rack by hand, and I covered the baking pan with foil to protect it and make clean up easier.My only complaints (and these are not really complaints, more like mild annoyances) are that 1) the crumb tray is just slightly wider than a regular size piece of aluminum foil, so if you want to completely line the tray, you need two pieces of foil. And, 2) the rack has a tendency to pitch forward if you pull it too far out of the oven, so you need to be mindful of that when checking food temps, etc., while cooking.So…so far, so good. I did purchase the optional warranty, just in case this one dies after a while. Thankfully, I had that on the other oven. Fingers crossed I won’t need it on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but a bit too small.
reviews.reviewText: This works well and looks very nice. However, I returned it because it was a bit too small. IT did not fit a pizza in it and could not fit a casserole 13 inches long.You spend $30 more for the Oster Air Fryer Oven, 10-in-1 Countertop Toaster Oven Air and you get a larger more useful product that fits pizzas and a large casserole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve never used an air fryer before so was a little skeptical. I followed the instructions and also the advice of some people in the reviews, when I first set it up I let it run for 30 min at 400° to get rid of the burn smell. The first thing I made was chicken wings, using the provided manual I cooked them at 400° for 25 minutes and they came out so golden and crispy I could not believe it!! It was easy to use and easy to clean. Would definitely recommend !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the air fry feature. Things get done a lot better than the air fryer I used to have. The basket keeps them from sitting in the drippings from whatever you are cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a replacement for the same one I had for 10 years. It went through two hurricanes total house destruction and still worked two years later. We only replaced it Because the fan finally quit working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Appears to be malfunctioning
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t even had this for a year so I’m really disappointed. Just recently it’s started to not show some of the words or numbers on the digital screen. It appears random and doesn’t always do this so I just shrugged it off. But now anytime I cook anything at 400 degrees (like salmon) it overheats after a few minutes and it cuts off. I like it overall but it’s really starting to worry me, like it may have some kind of circuit issue. I am really ticked off at how much money I’ve spent only to have it start having issues so quickly.

Es bastante grande, si cabe un pollo entero, muy buenas funciones, superó las expectativas, eso so es muy espaciosos, práctico y funcional, no vi diferencia en el consumo de la luz y la uso diario. Funciona muy bien, es cuestión de acostumbrarse a sus funciones

reviews.reviewTitle: Los presets del hornito lo hacen fácil de usar
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Es muy fácil de usar, todas las funciones que tiene prestablecidas funcionan perfectamente, lo utilizo principalmente para hacer panes, pasteles y deshidratar vegetales. El producto realmente es como se ve en las fotografías, se aprecia qué es un producto con buenos acabados y excelente relación calidad precio por todas las funciones que ofrece.
Es un pequeño horno en toda la extensión de la palabra, genial como auxiliar al cocinar para dos personas sin necesidad de usar el horno grande. Además sus funciones facilitan el trabajo.
Me gustó mucho cumple con su función fasil de usar

reviews.reviewTitle: Es justo lo que se describe.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Lo usé ayer ( 19/05/2021) para deshidratar epazote y dorar pan, todo muy bien muy rico y rápido. Como dicen en los comentarios, se hace un poco ondeado el plástico de la puerta, hace ruido, pero calienta rapidísimo, sobre todo es verdad que no cambia de Farenheit a Centígrados como dice el instructivo. Pero sí tiene marcada la C, yo creo que el instructivo está mal y se debe cambiar de otra forma, al respecto no tengo problemas y por eso, a pesar de ello lo compré. Es muy alto para lo que le cabe, pero nosotros somos 3 así que tampoco tengo problemas con ello.Lean bien lo que sé describe para ver si es lo que requieren. Ya después actualizo la reseña a ver qué tal.03/07/23Sigue funcionando de maravilla. Es algo difícil de lavar, pero lo amo, y lo uso casi diario. 😍😍😍 cambió a 5 estrellas.
